member.name: P:FSharp.Compiler.Interactive.ReadLineConsole.Prompt
member.summary: Inset all inputs by this amount

member.name: T:FSharp.Compiler.Interactive.ConsoleOptions
member.summary: System.Console.ReadKey appears to return an ANSI character (not the expected the unicode character). When this fix flag is true, this byte is converted to a char using the System.Console.InputEncoding. This is a code-around for bug://1345. Fixes to System.Console.ReadKey may break this code around, hence the option here.

member.name: M:Sample.FSharp.Compiler.Interactive.Main.StartServer``1(FSharp.Compiler.Interactive.Shell.FsiEvaluationSession,``0)
member.summary: Starts the remoting server to handle interrupt reuests from a host tool.

member.name: M:Sample.FSharp.Compiler.Interactive.Main.SetCurrentUICultureForThread(Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{System.Int32})
member.summary: Set the current ui culture for the current thread.
